title: Reporting On Rape Kit Backlog Leads To New Law And Arrests In Ohio
teaser: While researching sexual assaults for Cleveland's The Plain Dealer, Rachel Dissell unearthed a backlog of untested rape kits dating back to 1993. Ohio has since mandated the testing of these kits.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
